answers.answer: Tell your doctor asap. It's a sign of preclasmia(how ever you spell it)
Thats signs of high blood pressure which can bring on preeclampsia

question: Has anyone experienced blurred vision and migranes?, I'm 34 weeks + 4 days pregnant and today I experienced blurred vision for 20mins followed by an hour migrane,I felt sick and had lower back pain but it eventually went! Has anyone else experienced this!?
title: blurred vision?
